title: Neutralize roleplay-oriented copy in chat UI

requirements.summary: Revise chat UI text to describe a general chat assistant (not roleplay with Puro) while keeping the action-message "*" hint.
acceptanceCriteria: The empty state text no longer says "Say hello to Puro!" and is rewritten in English to invite a general conversation while still mentioning the "*" action convention.
The header/subtitle text no longer positions the bot as an in-character roleplay companion (e.g., replace "Your friendly companion" with neutral wording such as "Chat assistant" or similar).
No changes are made to any immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.

file_operations.description: Update the empty-state prompt copy to remove "Say hello to Puro!" and replace it with neutral assistant-oriented wording while still explicitly mentioning that messages ending with "*" are treated as actions.

Update the header/subtitle copy to remove roleplay/companion framing (e.g., replace "Your friendly companion" with neutral assistant wording such as "Chat assistant"). Keep existing layout and avoid changes to any immutable UI component paths.
